name: Snake Tube
description:
Swipe your finger to guide a snake of balls to break the blocks in the tube!
Try to break as many blocks as possible and reach the end of each level.
Get additional balls and make the largest snake you can!

Very easy to play but very hard to get high scores!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple swipe control
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore
